title: Security+ Practice Quiz
description: Test your cybersecurity knowledge with these Security+ exam questions

questions.question: What is the main purpose of a firewall?
options: To monitor and filter network traffic

questions.question: Which type of malware is designed to demand payment from the victim?
What does CIA stand for in cybersecurity?
What is the strongest form of user authentication?
Which protocol is used for secure web browsing?
What is a zero-day vulnerability?
options: A vulnerability that has been patched
A vulnerability discovered but not yet patched
A vulnerability that affects zero systems
A vulnerability that takes zero days to exploit

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a type of social engineering attack?
